description: Details of enhanced sound insulation value of at least 5dB above the maximum Building Regulations value, for the floor/ceiling/wall structures separating different types of rooms/uses in adjoining dwellings/areas, namely, bedrooms below/above kitchen/living/dining room of separate flat and of at least 10dB enhancement for the ground floor bedrooms adjoining the main entrance and entrance hall pursuant to condition 4 of planning permission ref: 250401FUL dated 10/04/2025 for: Part first floor extensions to no.3 and 5 Manor Way; Alterations to the existing flats A and B at no.3 Manor Way; and conversion of no.5 Manor Way into two self-contained flats (Joint Application).
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
